Detailed Description

Describes one joint of an IK chain.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum CSLIKJoint::EJointSolverType
 

Joint solver types.

Enumeration values:
SI_DEFAULT  default joint type.
SI_2D  2D joint.
SI_3D  3D joint.
